item.title: Shepherd's Finance LLC S-1
item.description: Shepherd’s Finance LLC, which is in the Short-Term Business Credit Institutions [6153] industry, SEC S-1 filing on March 22, 2022 had 46336 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: interest - 597 instances notes - 544 instances loans - 511 instances loan - 423 instances note - 397 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
